attributes.action: Give England it's own official National Anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there is no official national anthem for England.  Whilst this also applies to some other countries in the United Kingdom.  On such occasions like sporting events, other UK countries use their own unofficial anthems....except England, who use God Save The Queen.  Please 'Give England it's own official National Anthem'
